title: AI Reference
description: podo-ui provides structured JSON references that allow AI tools to easily understand and utilize the design system.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: The AI reference system consists of modular JSON files, allowing AI to selectively read only the information it needs. The main index file provides the overall structure, while detailed information is available in individual files.

mainIndex.title: Main Index (ai.json)
mainIndex.description: ai.json is the entry point for all references. It contains basic project information and paths to all modules.
